Title: Seven Reasons
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), David Shore, David Hoselton, Johanna Lee (executive story editor), David Renaud (story editor), Karen Struck (story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (staff writer)

Plot: Dr. Shaun Murphy suspects his patient is lying about the reason for her injury and makes a controversial assumption about her motives. Meanwhile, Dr. Neil Melendez's personal life could be ...
